Translations.Text: My zrobyly domovlenistʹ z vamy, shcho vy ne budete prolyty vashu krov, ne budete vy evict odyn odnoho z vashykh domivok. Vy uz·hodzheni ta davaly svidchennya

Dosi, osʹ, budʹ laska ubyvayuchyy odyn odnoho, ta evicting deyakyy z vas z yikhnikh domivok, banding proty nykh sinfully ta maliciously. Rivni koly vony zdalysya, vy zazhadaly vykupu z nykh. Evicting yim buly zaboroneni dlya vas u pershu cherhu. Vy viryte v chastyni svyatoho pysannya ta disbelieve u chastyni? Shcho retribution dlya ts sered vas shcho povynni buty tsi, krim prynyzhennya u tse zhyttya, ta dalekyy hirshyy retribution na Dni Resurrection? BOH nikoly unaware budʹ shcho vy
Tse - vony kotri kupyly tse nyzʹko zhyttya za rakhunok U maybutnʹomu. Otzhe, retribution nikoly zaminyayetʹsya dlya nykh, ne mozhe vony budutʹ dopomozheni

My daly Moses svyate pysannya, ta nastupni yomu my poslaly inshym kur'yeram, ta my daly Isusu, syn Mary, hlybokykh dyv ta pidtrymav yoho z Svyashchennym Dukh. Tse ne fakt shcho kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav do vas z budʹ shcho vas ne lyubyly, vash ego vyklykayetʹsya vy buty zukhvali? Deyakyy z nykh vy vidkhylyly, ta deyakyy z nykh vy zbyti
Deyakyy by skazaly, "Nashi rozum skladayutʹsya!" Zamistʹ tsʹoho, tse - proklʹon z BOHA, yak naslidok yikhnʹoho disbelief, shcho derzhytʹ yikh z viryachykh, krim dlya nechyslennoho z nykh
